document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Records. CRI* ČER* ČNG DON* IFR KHM* KHR KYI LUG* LWI MYK* ODE POL TER VIN ZAK ZAP* ŽIT* [Nowicky 1864: 36, 1873: 35; Łomnicki 1866: 7 , 1870: 81 , 1875: 177 , 1884: 31 ].
Distribution. West Palaearctic (excluding north), introduced to North America ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined. Chernihiv Prov.
:
1 spec. ( NSPU ) Mena Distr. , Blistova, V.N. Pavlyuk leg.,
4.vi.2002
;

Chernivtsi Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Putivl Distr. , Selyatin , grass under coniferous,
11.vii.1966
;
Crimea
: spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohisk Distr. , Bila Skelya, S. V . Volovnik ,
18.v.1983
;
Donetsk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Sloviansk ,
vi.1893
.
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Volnovakha Distr. , Mariupol forest experimental station, (D.) Shapiro leg.,
22.v.1937
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) idem,
20.v.1937 , 25.vi.1937
;
Kharkiv Prov.
: 1 spec. ( KUMN )
Kharkiv , Dokuchaeva , N. Yunakov leg.,
29.v.1995
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) idem,
25.v.1995
;

: 14 spec. ( ZIN ) Kamianets-Polilskyi Distr. , Bagovitsia , Grum-Grzhimajlo leg.,
19.v–18.vi.1895
;

: 1spec. ( SIZK )
Kyiv , Horbachykha tract, V . Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
3.viii.2000
;

: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Stanytsia
Luhanska Distr. , Yuganivka ,
on
Cirsium , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
26.vi.1983
;

: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Turka Distr. ,
8.vi.1965
;

: 1 spec. ( IMC )) Snihurivka Distr. , Svitla Dacha , V . K. Rafalskyj leg.,
30.v.1967
; spec. ( ZIN )
Odesa Prov.
: 2 spec. ( IMC ) Kotovsk [= Podilsk ], I. V . Maltsev leg.,
28.v.1964
;

: 1 spec. ( ZIN )
Poltava env., Th. Lukjanovitsh leg.,
4.vii.1926
;

;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) idem, 21.vii.97,
26.vii.1997
; Zakarpatska Prov. :
1 spec. ( IMC ) Rakhiv Distr. , Kvasy ,
22.vii.1966
;

Zaporizhia Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol Distr. , Sosnovka vill, Staroberdyansky forest , on the buds of
Cirsium setosum , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
12.vi.1983
;

1 spec. ( SIZK )
Zhytomyr , G. Proschiga leg.,
14.v.1920
.

Notes. During more than 100 years
L. carlinae
was mistakenly mixed with
L. planus
(see below) ( Gültekin 2006a ). Thus, some records on
L. planus
( Kryshtal 1949 : Mazur & Kuśka 1994 ;
Kubisz et al . 1998
;
Barsov et al. 1998
; Mazur 2002 ; Nazarenko et al. 2003; Nazarenko 2013) apparently refer to
L. carlinae
.
